channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2023080067
item.description:
Report X-2023080067

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-26
  • City: CHARLESTON
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: opened up trailer and leaking hazmat was found at the tail of the trailer. Package was bagged in a hazmat bag and contained in the hazmat storage area. third party hazmat cleanup service came in and neutralized the acid and placed them in drums for disposition. DescribePack: third party found that there were loose caps which resulted in failure. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HazMats were contained and the third party clean up crew neutralized the acid that was spilled.
